metadata.title: CVE-2022-43043 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC 2.1-DEV-rev368-gfd054169b-master was discovered to contain asegmentation violation via the function BD_CheckSFTimeOffset at/bifs/field_decode.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
